name: Real Sheet: D&D 3.0 Edition + Dice Table
name_original: Real Sheet: D&D 3.0 Edition + Dice Table
description:
Dungeons & Dragons - 3.0 edition Character

The first original sheet app, fully editable!

NOW WITH DICE TABLE INTEGRATED!


Application features:

- Text fields for each section and row

- Check each square with a single tap

- Zoom capabilities

- Via AirPrint you can print your sheet with all data

- Internal data memory

- Send your sheet by email

- Save your sheet in Photo Roll

- Share your sheet on Facebook and Twitter

- Easy to reset data

- DICE TABLE: Tap with 3 fingers on each sheet page to access the dice table area!

======================================

- Simple and intuitive:

open the application and your personal sheet will be on the front page!
...and NO advertising!
